name: Vindicator: Uprising
description: Vindicator: Uprising is a platform shoot 'em up with pixel graphics and an epic orchestral soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: 1.5GHz Intel compatible Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

reviews.review_text: A challenging, but fun, little game.  11/10 would die again.
